price: И питају те о Зулкарнејну. Реци: „Казаћу вам о њему неке вести.
arabic: وَيَسۡـَٔلُونَكَ عَن ذِي ٱلۡقَرۡنَيۡنِۖ قُلۡ سَأَتۡلُواْ عَلَيۡكُم مِّنۡهُ ذِكۡرًا

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wayasalūnaka ʿan dhī al-qarnayni qul sa-atlū ʿalaykum min'hu dhik'ran
